goals: supply team with ores and minerals
priorityRules: If health is low, consume food or move to a safe spot.
If ore blocks are nearby, equip pickaxe and collect them.
If in a cave with visible stone, dig for resources.
If messages request ores, prioritize delivering to the requester.
If surplus ores in inventory, create trade proposals.
If idle, explore nearby caves or dig down.
cooperationRules: Respond to item requests if I have the item and can spare it.
Broadcast ore vein locations when found.
Trade surplus ores for food and wood.
hostilityRules: Defend mining area from agents who approach aggressively.
Do not share diamond locations with hostile agents.
notes: Mine safely. If low health, retreat. Trade surplus for necessities.
